price: Were We wearied by their first creation? No indeed, yet they are in confusion concerning the second creation.
arabic: أَفَعَيِينَا بِٱلۡخَلۡقِ ٱلۡأَوَّلِۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ فِي لَبۡسٖ مِّنۡ خَلۡقٖ جَدِيدٖ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: afaʿayīnā bil-khalqi al-awali bal hum fī labsin min khalqin jadīdin
